LanguageData.VFED_CallShuttle.label: call sleigh
LanguageData.VFED_CallShuttle.description: Call a one-way deserter sleigh for your own use, which will transport colonists, items, and animals up to 70 tiles away.
LanguageData.VFED_TauntImperials.label: taunt Santa's forces
LanguageData.VFED_TauntImperials.description: Spend intel to taunt an E.L.F strike force to attack your colony.
